comment: DO NOT TAKE HIM for ksu freshman class, he gave out so much work, class lecture are point less, brings a load of guest speaker that helps nothing for the test. test is hard and load and load of work in class and homeworks....
um...supposed to be an easy A but...not likely, test r difficult and im not sure how many actually have passed them.(not get an A but PASSED them) there is extra credit though...

worst teacher for freshman class. Most of the KSU classes should be easy and not much work assigned, this teacher gave so much work and does nothing in the class but bring bunch of useless guest speaker. he is funny and nice but the class teaches nothing and test is extremelty hard
